title.value: Подбор штаммов кишечной палочки для конструирования вакцины против эшерихиоза поросят
Selection of colon bacterium strains for designing of a vaccine against swine colibacteriosis
Selection of colon bacterium strains for designing of a vaccine against swine colibacteriosis

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Lomako, Yu.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of studying cultural and morphological, biochemical, virulent and immunogenic properties of various isolates of Escherichia coli on which basis have been chosen the most active strains for designing of a vaccine against colibacteriosis of pigs are shown. 4 strains of intestinal stick from microorganisms' collection of Institute of Experimental Veterinary named after S.N.Vyshelesskij are subjected to research: strain E.coli 018 (KMIEHV-18), strain E.coli К88 (KMIEHV-40A), strain E.coli К99 (KMIEHV-38V), strain E.coli F41 (KMIEHV-98), and also epizootic strains, allocated by our laboratory which we have conditionally designated coli К88-B (SPC 'Borisovskij' in Borisov region), coli K88-L ('State farm Lidskij' in Lida region), coli К99-V (SPC 'Voronyany' in Ostrovetskij region), E.coli F41-V (SPC 'Voronyany' in Ostrovetskij region), coli 018-B (SPK 'Borisovskij' in Borisovskij region), coli 018-TD (OC 'TD' 'Zhdanovichi' in the Minsk region).
